input.sentences: everyone looked so excited for the wedding to start .
the bride arrived right on time looking beautiful .
the wedding brought great happiness to everyone there .
all the people congratulated the newlyweds .
the bride 's parents were especially happy .
output.sentences: If I were to be honest the groomsmen seemed just as nervous as the groom.
But, the groom calmed down as soon as he caught sight of the bride.
The wedding ceremony was beautiful going off without a hitch and the groom was so grateful he started hugging everyone except the bride.
Relatives had come from all over the world to attend this wedding and they got to see each other.
The wedding and reception being over gave the happy couple an opportunity to pose with friends including the Maid of Honor, the bride's little sister.
